title: IPH 328 -  O Come, all you faithful

lines: O come now, O come now, to
Come and behold Him, born the
He who abhors not the Virgin’s
Sing all you citizens of heaven
Jesus, to You be glory given!
Word of the Father now in flesh appearing:

chorus:
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
 Christ the Lord!
CCLI:
Latin, 18th century, possibly by
John Francis Wade, c. 1711-1786
translated Frederick Oakleley, 1802-1880 and others adapted compilers of Hymns for Today’s Church, 1982 CCLI 128675
